title: Get some Exceptional Indie Allies in this Humble Bundle
description: Some glorious indie games available to grab in the new Exceptional Indie Allies Humble Bundle, if you need to build up that collection.

title: Horde shooter Black Dragon Mage now has a demo, plus developer blog on Steam Deck
description: Black Dragon Mage is an upcoming dark fantasy, action-roguelite, top-down horde shooter (think like Vampire Survivors) and there's a demo out now. Plus the developer had some words to say on developing with the Steam Deck in mind.

title: They really did it - Valve added Dwarf as an official Steam tag
description: After a little mini-campaign from the likes of the crew behind Dwarf Fortress and Deep Rock Galactic, Valve added some new official Steam store tags for games.

title: Atmospheric narrative adventure A Void Hope launches February 29th
description: From the team that gave us Alwa's Awakening and Alwa's Legacy, Elden Pixels have announced the release date for their latest gorgeous looking adventure platformer with A Void Hope launching February 29th.

title: OBS Studio 30.1 Beta 1 adds Video Capture Device (PipeWire) source, plus more AV1 support
description: A fresh Beta is available for the video recording and livestreaming app OBS Studio, with OBS Studio 30.1 Beta 1 bringing various new features and fixes.

title: Linux remains above macOS on the Steam Survey for January 2024
description: The monthly Steam Hardware & Software Survey is here for January 2024, and while there was a drop for both Linux and macOS we're still seeing Linux be firmly in second place on Steam now.
